name: POP_4_Support_for_Monitoring_Response_Notifications_Regarding_a_Specific_Patient_s_Health
title: POP.4 Support for Monitoring Response Notifications Regarding a Specific Patient's Health (Function)
description: In the event of a health risk alert, evaluate whether expected actions have been taken, and execute follow-up notification otherwise.
purpose: The system assists in follow-up for a specific patient event that has failed to occur (e.g., follow-up to a health alert or absence of an expected laboratory result) and communicate the omission to the appropriate care provider(s).

statement.label: POP.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL determine and render to the provider specific recommended actions that may be taken at the patient level regarding a health risk alert.

statement.label: POP.4#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL determine and render a notification to appropriate care providers of specific actions to be taken regarding the set of patients who are the target of a health risk alert.

statement.label: POP.4#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL determine and render a list of those patients who have not received appropriate action in response to a health risk alert.

statement.label: POP.4#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to determine and render a status report regarding the compliance of the set of all patients who are the target of a health risk alert.
